title: ID: Right Gin label
content:
hi all,

Can anyone identify the face for “RIGHT” in the label?

I’m interested in similar faces as well if any come to mind.

thanks,  
jarrod

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123034303im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Right_gin2_5634.jpg)

 [‹ Does anybody recognizes this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123034303/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40732 "Go to previous forum topic") [DeLonghi logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123034303/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40726 "Go to next forum topic")
author: begsini

comments.content:
It looks like some weight of FB Armada except for the leg of the R - maybe an alternate?

Nick Cooke
Reminds me of [Clicker](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123034303/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Clicker) too. But it’s not the one. :)
